xxs.$description: Extra extra small - 4px. Micro adjustments, tight internal spacing.

xs.$description: Extra small - 8px. Chip padding, tight component spacing.

sm.$description: Small - 12px. Small gaps between elements, compact layouts.

md.$description: Medium - 16px. Default spacing, card padding, comfortable gaps. Most common unit.

lg.$description: Large - 24px. Section spacing, generous padding, bento card internal spacing.

xl.$description: Extra large - 32px. Major section breaks, screen padding.

xxl.$description: Extra extra large - 48px. Hero spacing, major layout divisions.

xxxl.$description: Extra extra extra large - 64px. Maximum spacing for dramatic separation.

minimum.$description: Minimum touch/click target size per WCAG 2.2 AA. Critical for accessibility - all interactive elements.

containerMax.$description: Maximum container width for desktop. Dashboard benefits from this constraint.

sidebarWidth.$description: Standard sidebar width for navigation, filters.
